post_detail.title: Smirnoff: Nightlife Exchange Project
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

As lead flash developer, I managed a team that programmed a 3D motion graphics piece developed in Flash that was projected on a giant screen at each of Smirnoffâ€™s 26 parties around the world.

Execution:

JWT was tasked with creating a campaign to engage Smirnoff consumers worldwide. The Nightlife Exchange Project rolled out in 14 countries and 6 continents around the world. Smirnoff invited consumers worldwide to contribute their ideas about what makes their local nightlife unique. The most inspiring ideas from each region were captured online through Facebook and exchanged with a partnering country during a giant one night multi-locational party in an attempt to create a once-in-a-lifetime experience on the same night across the globe.

By connecting our global network and capabilities, we are able to help Smirnoff deliver a-one-of-a-kind nightlife experience that will be attracting more than 10 million participants across the world.
